;One of the initial things that men and women wind up doing without ever realizing it is eating larger portions than they think they are actually consuming. Many people believe that one chicken breast is actually a portion size but if you decide to actually weigh this out you are going to discover that one chicken breast equals almost two portions. And naturally if you make this mistake at each and every meal, throughout an entire day you will be eating twice the volume of food that you should be eating.
